Plot: Melting sea ice, glacier loss and rising sea levels. Severe droughts and wildfires. Increasingly severe tornadoes, hurricanes, and flooding. Record heat waves. Climate change is no longer a...
Title: Greedy Lying Bastards
Writer: Patrick Gambuti Jr., Craig Scott Rosebraugh
Actors: Enoch Adams, George W. Bush, Philip Cooney, Kert Davies
tomatoConsensus: It's not particularly subtle, but Greedy Lying Bastards is effective in questioning the motives of climate change deniers.
